comments: Professor Lawton was very interesting. The reviews posted on here about him are accurate. His tests are difficult and the homework is too. Be prepared to be called on in class. He makes comments that put you on the spot and can be rude at times. I only did well because I knew the material before taking the class. Having a tutor would be beneficial.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Unsure if he liked me but overall, I liked him. Not an easy class but it\'s very doable. Important to show up and study. Pre-read the subjects beforehand! Memorize the stupid unit circle. HW is only 10% but if you do it, you\'ll do much better on tests. He regularly calls on students for answers to in-class probs. I put in C-level effort and got a C

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Definition of "not out to get you". If you forget to turn in a take home quiz or do your homework you can ask him if he\'ll still take it and most times the answer is yes. He\'s passionate about math and does all of his lectures using the whiteboard (rather than slideshows) His tests are easier than the problems he gives you in class. Overall great

stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  CARING
comments: Professor Lawton is a solid teacher. He teaches very well, and is always willing to explain if someone isn\'t grasping a concept. He does assign a lot of homework, so be prepared to work for a good grade. However, the upside is that there is a lot of points, so if you don\'t do well on one thing, there\'s always a chance to boost your grade.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Even though I struggle with math I loved taking a class from Professor Lawton. He was engaging which encouraged the classful of AA students to actually want to learn math. He was very caring, encouraging, and made sure no one felt stupid for coming up with a wrong answer (Although he would tell us straight up if we did get it wrong).

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Mr. Lawton is an impressive man. Not super patient, or has a weird sense of humor. Makes buzzer noises at the students when they get something wrong. He will make you learn everyone\'s name. The man likes pushback, so be firm with him. He does not stick to his deadlines. No test review sheets. Some tests without calc. Not generous with credit.

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  INSPIRATIONAL  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Professor Lawton explains things well and shows why they matter in real life. He did a great job making complicated concepts seem simple. He assigns a lot of homework, but not more than any other college-level calculus class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: This was hands-down the hardest class I\'ve ever taken. Insane amounts of homework (60 problems/lesson). While Lawton\'s a great guy, he\'s a somewhat dry professor. For most of the semester, I had a D+ in the class, so please go see him in his office; he\'s a lot more helpful outside of class. You\'ll need to study your tail off to pass.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Lawton is a great instructor. He takes care to repeat difficult problems to help build a better understanding of them before a test. He cares about students. Tests are difficult but he is generous with points as long as you have good work. Do the homework, it will help on tests and take home quizzes. One of the better math teachers I have had.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Lawton made sure that you had the information you needed to figure it out in and out of class. His teaching style was best for me. I heard math classes at Pikes Peak are tough anyways and would strongly recommend him.

stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Professor Lawton is very knowledgeable about math. He writes problems up on the board for you and a partner to solve. He assigns just enough homework for you to understand the material, but it would be good to do extra. He also expects you to do reading before the class and come to class with questions.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Mr. Lawton was a great professor! I had taken Algebra at the High School level, and a lot of the same concepts were covered. He moves fast, so it was easier for me to follow along since I had a basic understanding of the material. The problems on the test are very similar to quizzes and study guides he provides. Would definitely take him again!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Great math teacher. Tough grader on 8 take-home quizzes & 6 exams (incl. final). Exam questions much like in-class problems & some MML HW. Do all assigned MML HW (about 10-15 hrs/wk) and start studying for exams 4 days out, and you\'ll get a B. Drops lowest 2 MML HW scores & replaces lowest exam score w/ final if higher, so do well!

stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Mr. Lawton is a good professor. He definitely expects you to work hard but actually cares about his students. Overall he is a tough teacher but it was well worth it. Would take him again.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Mr. Lawton is a really good professor. He explains clearly and gives tests that match the problems he works through in lecture. Expect to be called upon in class, he makes lecture interactive by asking questions and having you work problems with your neighbor in class. This approach gets you thinking and participating rather than just watching him.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Prof. Lawton is very intense and is a very difficult teacher. YOU MUST BE IN CLASS, and you not only have you be in class YOU MUST PAY ATTENTION FOR THE WHOLE CLASS. He is condescending and dry but helpful and annoyingly like-able. He cares about your success but you must work for it, very hard. Tests are, very difficult and he is a tough grader.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LECTURE HEAVY  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: It\'s a hard class, but he is a good teacher. He is very patient if you don\'t understand. He assigns a lot of homework, but if you keep up with it, it is not that bad. He is really nice and tries to make the concepts as easy to understand as he can. I enjoyed this course and learned a lot.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: The course is intensive, it seems like a lot but take it 1 step at a time. DO THE HOMEWORK it seems so unimportant and a lot but it really helps you understand and remember it, and helps your grade a lot. He wants you to succeed, there is never a dumb question to ask him. Be honest & speak up if you don\'t get it, he\'s more than willing to help you

comments: He can be boring, but he\'s not horrible. There is a lot of homework, but it\'s usually not too hard. He is pretty nice and very good at explaining confusing concepts. Not a fun course, but not terrible at all.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (13)  Tough Grader (9)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (7)  Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (4)  Respected (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Caring (2)  Inspirational (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: He was very dry and straight to the point. If you don\'t pay attention in class and he sees you he may ask you a question. As long as you do your work and try then you should be good.
